meanings.definition: Any of a group of organic compounds that are essential for normal growth and nutrition and are required in small quantities in the diet because they cannot be synthesized by the body.
meanings.sent1: Eating fruits and vegetables provides essential vitamins for our bodies.
meanings.sent2: Doctors recommend taking vitamins to stay healthy.
meanings.sent3: The vitamins in the salad were having a party in my stomach!
meanings.sent4: Her laughter was like a burst of vitamins, spreading joy to everyone around.
meanings.sent5: The vitamins acted like tiny superheroes, protecting my cells from harm.

meanings.definition: A tablet of substances that are thought to promote a healthy life when taken regularly.
meanings.sent1: Every morning, she takes her vitamins to start the day right.
meanings.sent2: The store sells various brands of vitamins for different needs.
meanings.sent3: The vitamins in the bottle whispered words of encouragement to each other.
meanings.sent4: His positive attitude was like a daily dose of vitamins, keeping everyone uplifted.
meanings.sent5: The vitamins were like little health soldiers, fighting off illnesses.
